regex: BHD (\d*\.?\d+|\d{1,3}(,\d{3})*(\.\d+)?) (transaction was made on card)( ending.*)at(.*)on (.*)
BHD (\d*\.?\d+|\d{1,3}(,\d{3})*(\.\d+)?) (was withdrawn from Acc.)( ending.*)through network ATM. Your available balance is now BHD (\d*\.?\d+|\d{1,3}(,\d{3})*(\.\d+)?)
Dear customer your payment of BHD (\d*\.?\d+|\d{1,3}(,\d{3})*(\.\d+)?) (through FAWRI/SWIFT service is credited to your account)(.*)
Please note BHD (\d*\.?\d+|\d{1,3}(,\d{3})*(\.\d+)?) (was credited to Acc.)( ending.*). Your available balance is now BHD (\d*\.?\d+|\d{1,3}(,\d{3})*(\.\d+)?)
Dear customer your salary BHD (\d*\.?\d+|\d{1,3}(,\d{3})*(\.\d+)?) (through FAWRI/SWIFT service is credited to your account)(.*)
A cash withdrawal of BHD (\d*\.?\d+|\d{1,3}(,\d{3})*(\.\d+)?) (through cheque has been debited from your account)(.*)
(Your) (Local fund transfer request) of BHD (\d*\.?\d+|\d{1,3}(,\d{3})*(\.\d+)?) (.*). Your current available balance is BHD (\d*\.?\d+|\d{1,3}(,\d{3})*(\.\d+)?)
